keyMappings:
# Clean slate
unmapAll

# Vimari mirror
map i enterInsertMode

map a LinkHints.activateMode
map ; LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab

map c removeTab
map r reload

map d focusInput
map h scrollPageUp
map t scrollPageDown
map n previousTab
map s nextTab
map - Vomnibar.activateInNewTab

map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map m scrollToTop
map w scrollToBottom
map v goBack
map z goForward

map ' scrollLeft
map , scrollRight

map <up> scrollUp
map <down> scrollDown

# Vimium extras
map p openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map y copyCurrentUrl

map f enterFindMode
map g performFind
map G performBackwardsFind
map C closeTabsOnRight
map l duplicateTab

map H goPrevious
map T goNext
map N moveTabLeft
map S moveTabRight
searchEngines:
# Work
-: https://golinks.io/%s Go Links
c: https://marqeta.atlassian.net/wiki/search?text=%s Confluence
d: https://drive.google.com/drive/search?q=%s Google Drive
g: https://github.marqeta.com/search?q=%s&type=code Github
i: https://app.datadoghq.com/infrastructure?groups=role&sort=group%2Casc&tags=env%3Aprod%2Cservice%3A%s-ccapi Datadog Infrastructure
j: https://marqeta.atlassian.net/issues/?jql=text%20~%20%22%s%22 Jira
l: https://app.datadoghq.com/logs?query=%s Datadog Logs
p: https://app.datadoghq.com/apm/services/%s-ccapi/operations/iso.8583/resources?env=prod Datadog APM Prod
q: https://app.datadoghq.com/apm/services/%s-ccapi/operations/iso.8583/resources?env=qa Datadog APM QA
s: https://app.datadoghq.com/apm/services/%s-mysql/operations/mysql.query/resources?env=prod Datadog MySQL APM Prod

# Personal
a: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
m: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google Maps
u: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
y: https://www.yelp.com/search?find_desc=%s Yelp
